portfolio.title: School ERP
portfolio.description: An ERP system built in Django for schools to manage marks, homework, notices, attendance, fees, student & employee registration. Separate dashboard for students, teachers and administrator.

portfolio.title: Sknox Website
portfolio.description: Implemented end to end Skynox website built from scratch in my Skynox internship, built with GatsbyJS(React Framework)

portfolio.title: MERN Blog
portfolio.description: A blog website wherein Users can submit blog posts and view blogs written by other users in their feed.Once signed in Users can comment & like each blog. Built using ReactJS at front-end & NodeJS at the back-end and deployed to Heroku.

portfolio.title: Shopping Cart
portfolio.description: A CRUD shopping cart web app in ReactJS and Bootstrap implemented using firebase real-time database, authentication and firebase hosting.

portfolio.title: Shopping Cart (Django)
portfolio.description: Simple Shopping Cart web app with authentication where user can search available products to buy, add, delete products from the cart. Bootstrap for front end and Django for back-end.

duty: Developed an end to end web app in the GatsbyJS framework. https://skynox.tech/
Implemented and maintained two NextJs web apps, uncovering and debugging issues, and addressing inconsistencies.

Heroku for daily analysis.

Added PDF generation, Excel manipulation and image compression features using various 
python packages
Built new user-facing features, design, and fixed flaws for existing projects.
